name: Superbig Cheese Roll
description:
Join the cheese festival and roll down the Chees hill as a cheese, and try to hit as many people as you can.

Try out all the 12 exquisite cheeses with 5 extras.

Control the cheese with the A and D keys or the Arrow keys. (default)

You unlock cheeses and extras by getting score.

Extra modes are:

  • Double Size Mode: Doubles cheese size
  • Super Fast Mode: Hitting peeps adds speed
  • Slowmo Combo: Enter slow-mo by getting high combos
  • Moon Gravity: Halves gravity
  • Golden Cheese: Cheese will be made of solid gold
